title: Gamification-Based Elementary Arithmetic Skill Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and fractional concepts
context.additional_context: Offline blended learning environment using digital devices (tablets/laptops). Learners are job seekers preparing for careers in education (e.g., after-school instructors) who need to acquire teaching methodologies applicable to elementary education settings

learning_goals: Learners can solve fraction/decimal operation problems with 80% accuracy within four weeks.
Learners improve calculation speed by 40% upon completion of the six-month course using gamification tools.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans by analyzing peer feedback and game reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
